sentences.sContent: The nonlinear response and bifurcation of piecewise dynamic system are investigated.
sentences.sContent_eng: The nonlinear response and bifurcation of piecewise dynamic system are investigated.
sentences.sCn: 研究了存在分段线性情况下动力学系统响应的分叉。

sentences.sContent: With this method the structural analysis of static and kinematic indeterminate foldable systems is conducted and the kinematic bifurcation points of pin-connected foldable structures along motion pat.
sentences.sContent_eng: With this method the structural analysis of static and kinematic indeterminate foldable systems is conducted and the kinematic bifurcation points of pin-connected foldable structures along motion pat.
sentences.sCn: 采用该方法对静不定动不定折叠体系进行了求解，确定了铰接式折叠结构的运动分歧点并求解了其高阶相容方程。
